Cocktails.name: Amaretto Sour
Cocktails.description: Almond Liqueur, Lemon Juice, Sugar and a Maraschino Cherry

Cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
Cocktails.description: Aperol Liqueur with Soda & Prosecco Served with fruit. A great summer drink

Cocktails.name: Aviation
Cocktails.description: Floral and fresh, Gin and Violet Liqueur shaken over ice, served with a Maraschino Cherry

Cocktails.name: Bahama Mama
Cocktails.description: Totally Tropical! White Rum with Pineapple, Orange, and Passionfruit

Cocktails.name: Bellini
Cocktails.description: Peach with Prosecco. So simple, but it works.

Cocktails.name: Between the Sheets
Cocktails.description: Brandy, Cointreau, and Lemon. Served up

Cocktails.name: Black Russian
Cocktails.description: Coffee, Cola, and Vodka. A curious combination

Cocktails.name: Bramble
Cocktails.description: Gin, served with a Sugar/Lemon mix & Raspberry to give this Gin drink a sharp initial taste, which then settles as a sweet fresh fruity cocktail.

Cocktails.name: Clover Club
Cocktails.description: From Philadelphia in the late 1800s, a smooth gin-based cocktail. Served in a coupette.

Cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
Cocktails.description: A Posh Vodka & Cranberry, served in a martini glass with Orange Liqueur & a burnt zest of Orange peel to garnish.

Cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
Cocktails.description: “Free Cuba” a Rum, with coke, a squeeze of lime to finish

Cocktails.name: Dark & Stormy
Cocktails.description: Rum, with Ginger Beer, a touch of Lime and a shake of Angostura Bitters

Cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
Cocktails.description: This is the Vodka & Energy drink for Connoisseur, with coffee instead of the energy stuff in the cans.

Cocktails.name: French 75
Cocktails.description: Champagne Cocktail, it's basically a Gin Sour, topped with Champagne as opposed to soda, then served in a champagne flute

Cocktails.name: Gin & Tonic
Cocktails.description: Gin with Tonic Water, garnished with Lemon or Lime

Cocktails.name: Green Garden
Cocktails.description: Gin, with Elderflower cordial, Apple Juice & lots of fresh mint, with a touch of Ginger beer

Cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
Cocktails.description: That one everyone knows as the drink with a bit of everything. Vodka, Triple Sec/Cointreau, Rum, Gin, a touch of Lemon Juice, all brought together with Cola

Cocktails.name: Lychee Martini
Cocktails.description: Vodka, with Lychee Juice, Lychee Liqueur shaken & served straight up in a Coupette.

Cocktails.name: Mai Tai
Cocktails.description: There are so many recipes, in short & simple terms. Its White Rum, Dark Rum, Lime, with Almond flavour & Pineapple.

Cocktails.name: Margarita
Cocktails.description: Tequila, with Dry Orange Liqueur & Lime Juice, we serve our Margaritas without Salt, If you need it, just ask.

Cocktails.name: Mojito
Cocktails.description: Classic Cocktail made of Rum, Lime, Mint & Sugar, all brought down with Soda water

Cocktails.name: Negroni
Cocktails.description: A Stirred mix of Campari, Gin & Sweet Vermouth diluted with plenty of ice & served with a touch of bitters & an Orange peel

Cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
Cocktails.description: It’s Whisky, diluted over a touch of ice, with a little sweetness added, an orange & some angostura bitters.

Cocktails.name: Piña Colada
Cocktails.description: Rum, with Coconut, Pineapple & a touch of cream

Cocktails.name: Pornstar Martini
Cocktails.description: Passion Fruit with Vanilla, Vodka & Prosecco

Cocktails.name: Whisky Sour
Cocktails.description: Bourbon Whiskey, Lemon Juice, Sugar, Bitters and a Cherry

Cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
Cocktails.description: Always a fun one with Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Cranberry and Orange Juice

Cocktails.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
Cocktails.description: Rum, Lime & Strawberries, Shaken & Served straight up in a Martini Glass

Cocktails.name: Tom Collins
Cocktails.description: Gin shaken with Lemon, a touch of sugar & finished off with a splash of Soda

Cocktails.name: Rossini
Cocktails.description: Strawberry Puree, with prosecco and half a strawberry.

Cocktails.name: Pisco Sour
Cocktails.description: Pisco, a distilled grape spirit, shaken with lemon. The national drink of Peru

Cocktails.name: White Russian
Cocktails.description: Coffee and Vodka, shaken with milk

Cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
Cocktails.description: Gin, with Cherry brandy, Lemon Juice then topped with soda & finished with a tiny dash of Pomegranate Syrup.

Cocktails.name: Southside Royale
Cocktails.description: Gin, with Lime, Sugar, a touch of mint shaken together with a Prosecco finish

Cocktails.name: Hemmingway Daiquiri
Cocktails.description: Rum, Lime & maraschino liqueur, shaken with grapefruit juice

Cocktails.name: Planters Punch
Cocktails.description: Rum, lime, orange, and pineapple. A Caribbean Cocktail

Cocktails.name: Zombie
Cocktails.description: A Tiki Tipple. Rum, and brandy with fruit juices
